content:
ViewStateData Class

Definition

This class acts as a surrogate for holding view state properties (VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize and WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState) as attached properties when view state separation is done.

In this Article

public sealed class ViewStateData
Inheritance
Object
ViewStateData

ViewStateData()

public ViewStateData ();

Properties

Id

Gets or sets an identifier that associates an object of this class with an activity that has matching WorkflowViewState.RefId value.

public string Id { get; set; }
Value
String

The identifier that associates an object of this class with an activity that has matching WorkflowViewState.RefId value.
